column4: Hey. My brother have been trying to install FlashPlugin for some time now, without any progess.. Can someone please help us?
is he running the 64bit or 32bit version of ubuntu
sudo aptitude install flashplugin-nonfree , or search for flash in the add/remove dialog
ok, add/remove preferences button, make sure the first 4 check marks are selected, along with at least the first 2 on the updates tab.
hm, start the add remove program
when that's open, the preferences button, next to help
yes. Now, the checkmarks there are about where you can get packages. You should select the first four
flash is in multiverse, by the way
hrm, what version of ubuntu are you running, 7.04?
yes, it doesn't even get security updates anymore
you took the words right out of my mouth :)
a sec, while I see if those notes are still around
yw. I hope you enjoy it
